ygData.subject: Silence is golden
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay question: I am going to start a new character being that mine is becoming kinda blah.. I still am going to play him regularly.. but I want to have a side
ygData.messageBody:
Okay question: I am going to start a new character being that mine is
becoming kinda blah.. I still am going to play him regularly.. but I want to
have a side character to play when my main character gets bored.. I also
want to twink the hell outa my newbie.. so.. I am looking for suggestions..
at this point, I am playing a Mage .. and am looking to the ways of the
Paladin, Druid or Ranger or cleric. I am gearing towards the Druid, because
the cool ability to Teleport around later... Has anyone played a druid
successfully even after the apparent nerfing of their Kiting ability ?

Nate Spiritsummoner 24 Mage
Rodcet Nife
